title: Training Routines?
body:
Hey League Players! 
Are there any training routines that I could do to train myself up for warding, jungle timing and last hitting etc.?

replies.body:
Last hitting, you go into a custom and just work on it, it's basically practice makes perfect (Google the perfect minion count and try to get 95% in 5 minutes etc.).

As for Jungle timing and Warding these are things you need to just force yourself to think about in game, as these relate to actually hitting tab, and looking at your map more then the skills themselves.

Warding is rather simple and if you google best warding spots, there are so many things for it.

As for jungle times, just learn them, 5 minutes for buffs, 6 minutes dragon, 7 minutes baron, and these all appear in tab if you see them die, if not, you can generally guess when they died from information given by the enemy team.
